snippet.title: Soul Chomper Gameplay
snippet.description:
Download Soul Chomper: https://just2d.itch.io/soul-chomper
Visit us over at Itch.io: https://just2d.itch.io/

In this small action roguelike you play as a little ghost, fighting your way through hordes of enemies to conquer their world. You have a big arsenal of different weapons at your disposal to achieve your goal, if you can find them. At the end you'll face one of two mini bosses before entering another world to be conquered.
